mdRecord.dcterms:description: A fairly large piece has been torn from one corner of this item. The text of this certificate reads, "Virginia Normal and Industrial Institute. Certificate of Proficiency. This Certifies, That the bearer Clarence M. Wood has completed satisfactorily the two years' course in Business . . . " [a gap here where the page is torn] ". . . the regular Normal Course of study of the Virginia Normal and Industrial In [missing] is therefore granged this Special Certificate of Proficiency in the above department. Signed, sealed and certified this 15th day of May 1914." One signature has been torn away. The other is R. E. Sanders, Head of Department.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia Normal and Industrial Institute Certificate of Proficiency, May 15, 1914
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Diplomas
Virginia Normal and Industrial Institute
